Verses: 1 pinnum Mose Poi Isravelar Yaavaraiyum Nokki:
2 indru Naan Nootriyiruvadhu Vayadhullavan; Ini Naan Pokkum Varaththumaayirukkak Koodaadhu; Indha Yordhaanai Nee Kadandhupovadhillai Endru Karththar Ennode Solliyirukkiraar.

3 un Dhevanaagiya Karththardhaame Unakku Munbaagak Kadandhupovaar, Avare Unakku Munnindru, Andha Dhesaththaarai Azhippaar; Nee Avargal Dhesaththaich Sudhandharippaai; Karththar Sonnabadiye Yosuvaa Unakku Munbaagak Kadandhupovaan.
4 karththar Azhiththa Emoriyarin Raajaakkalaagiya Seekonukkum, Okukkum, Avargal Dhesaththirkum Seydhadhupolave Avargalukkum Seyvaar.
5 naan Ungalukku Vidhiththa Kattalaigalinbadi Avargalukkuch Seyvadharku Karththar Avargalai Ungalukku Oppukkoduppaar.

6 neengal Balangondu Thidamanadhaayirungal, Avargalukkup Bayappadavum Thigaikkavum Vendaam; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththardhaame Unnodekooda Varugiraar; Avar Unnai Vittu Vilaguvadhum Illai; Unnaik Kaividuvadhum Illai Endru Sonnaan.

7 pinbu Mose Yosuvaavai Azhaiththu, Isravelar Ellaarum Paarththirukka, Avanai Nokki: Balangondu Thidamanadhaayiru; Karththar Ivargalukkuk Koduppen Endru Ivargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Dhesaththukku Nee Indha Janaththai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Adhai Ivargal Sudhandharikkumbadiseyvaai.
8 karththardhaame Unakku Munbaagap Pogiravar, Avar Unnode Iruppaar; Avar Unnai Vittu Vilaguvadhumillai, Unnaik Kaividuvadhumillai; Nee Bayappadavum Kalangavum Vendaam Endraan.
9 mose Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththai Ezhudhi, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyaich Sumakkira Levipuththiraraana Aasaariyarukkum Israveludaiya Mooppar Ellaarukkum Oppuviththu,
10 avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittadhu Ennavendraal: Vidudhalaiyin Varushamaagiya Ovvoru Ezhaam Varushaththinmudivile Koodaarappandigaiyil,

11 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhukollum Sthaanaththil, Isravelar Ellaarum Avarudaiya Sannidhiyil Serndhuvandhirukkumbodhu, Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththai Isravelar Ellaarumketka Avargalukku Munbaaga Vaasikkakkadavaai.

12 purushargalum Sthireegalum Pillaigalum Un Vaasalgalilirukkum Anniyargalum Kettu, Katrukkondu, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Indha Niyaayappiramaana Vaarththaigalinbadi Yellaam Seyyak Gavanamaayirukkumbadikkum,

13 adhai Ariyaadha Avargal Pillaigalum Kettu, Neengal Yordhaanaik Kadandhu Sudhandharikkappogira Dhesaththil Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayappadak Katrukkollumbadikkum Janaththaikkootti, Adhai Vaasikkavendum Endraan.

14 pinpu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Idho, Nee Marikkungaalam Sameebiththirukkiradhu; Naan Yosuvaavukkuk Kattalaikodukkumbadi, Avanai Azhaiththukkondu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Vandhu Nillungal Endraar; Appadiye Moseyum Yosuvaavum Poi, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Nindraargal.
15 karththar Koodaaraththile Megasthambaththil Dharisanamaanaar; Megasthambam Koodaaravaasalmel Nindradhu.

16 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Un Pidhaakkalode Paduththukkollappogiraai; Indha Janangal Ezhumbi, Thaangal Poyirukkum Dhesaththilulla Anniya Dhevargalaich Soramaarkkamaaip Pinbatri, Ennaivittu, Thangaludane Naan Pannina Udanbadikkaiyai Meeruvaargal.

17 annaalile Naan Avargalmel Kobangondu, Avargalaik Kaivittu, En Mugaththai Avargalukku Maraippen; Adhinaal Avargal Patchikkappadumbadikku Anega Theengugalum Ikkattugalum Avargalaith Thodarum; Annaalile Avargal: Engal Dhevan Engal Naduve Iraadhadhinaale Allavaa Indhath Theengugal Engalaith Thodarndhadhu Enbaargal.
18 avargal Vere Dhevargalidaththil Thirumbippoi Seydha Sagala Theemaigalinimiththamum Naan Annaalile En Mugaththai Maraikkave Maraippen.

19 ippozhudhu Neengal Indhap Paattai Ezhudhikkondu, Idhai Isravel Puththirarukkup Padippiththu, Indhappaattu Enakkuch Saatchiyaaga Isravel Puththirarukkulle Irukkumbadi Idhai Avargal Vaayil Vazhangappannungal.

20 naan Avargal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittukkoduththa Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththil Avargalaip Piravesikkappanninapinbu, Avargal Pusiththuth Thirupthiyaagi Kozhuththuppoyirukkumbodhu, Avargal Vere Dhevargalidaththil Thirumbi, Avargalaich Seviththu, Enakkuk Kobammootti, En Udanbadikkaiyai Meeruvaargal.

21 anega Theengugalum Ikkattugalum Avargalaith Thodarumbodhu, Avargal Sandhadhiyaarin Vaayil Marandhupogaadhirukkum Indhap Paatte Avargalukku Virodhamaana Saatchi Pagarum; Naan Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththil Avargalaip Piravesikkappannaadhirukkira Ippozhudhe Avargal Kondirukkum Ennam Innadhu Endru Ariven Endraar.
22 andraikke Mose Andhap Paattai Ezhudhi, Adhai Isravel Puththirarukkup Padippiththaan.

23 avar Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavai Nokki: Nee Balangondu Thidamanadhaayiru, Isravel Puththirarukku Naan Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththil Nee Avargalai Nadaththikkondupovaai; Naan Unnodiruppen Endru Kattalaiyittaar.
24 mose Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththin Vaarththaigal Muzhuvadhaiyum Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhi Mudiththapinbu,
25 mose Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyaich Sumakkira Leviyarai Nokki:
26 neengal Indha Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththai Eduththu, Adhai Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyin Pakkaththile Vaiyungal; Ange Adhu Unakku Virodhamaana Saatchiyaayirukkum.

27 naan Un Kalakakkunaththaiyum Un Kadinak Kazhuththaiyum Arindhirukkiren; Indru Naan Innum Ungaludan Uyirodirukkaiyil, Karththarukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampannineergale; En Maranaththirkuppinbu Evvalavu Adhigamaaik Kalagampannuveergal!

28 ungal Koththirangalilulla Mooppar Ungal Adhibadhigal Ellaarudaiya Kaadhugalum Ketkaththakkadhaaga Naan Indha Vaarththaigalaich Sollavum, Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Saatchivaikkavum Avargalai Ennidaththil Koodivaraseyyungal.

29 en Maranaththirkuppinbu Neengal Nichchayamaai Ungalaik Ketduththu, Naan Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyitta Vazhiyaivittu Vilaguveergal; Aagaiyaal, Kadaisinaatkalil Theengu Ungalukku Neridum; Ungal Kaikkiriyaigalinaale Karththaraik Kobappaduththumbadikku, Avar Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhaich Seyveergal Enbadhai Ariven Endru Solli,
30 isravel Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Ketka Mose Indhap Paattin Vaarththaigalai Mudiyumvaraiyum Sonnaan.
